item.title: T1 Line With Instant Wireless Backup
item.description: Losing business broadband during a crucial moment can be incredibly frustrating. This is why many companies choose dedicated T1 lines instead of standard DSL or cable internet, despite the higher reliability of T1, they can still experience outages. Issues like equipment malfunctions or accidents can unexpectedly cut your connection. To prevent downtime, some companies opt for diverse T1 service, ordering two lines from separate providers. However, this solution isn’t foolproof, as both lines often use the same physical infrastructure owned by the Incumbent Local Exchange Carrier (ILEC).
